bibl.title: Roman Religio as a Framework at Tacitus' Histories 4.83-84.
bibl.note: Compares how Tacitus (Histories 4, 83-84) and Plutarchus (Isis and Osiris 361F) present the transfer of the god Sarapis from Sinope to Alexandria. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Benjamin W. Hicks, Roman Religio as a Framework at Tacitus' Histories 4.83-84.
Compares how Tacitus (Histories 4, 83-84) and Plutarchus (Isis and Osiris 361F) present the transfer of the god Sarapis from Sinope to Alexandria. - Avec résumé en anglais.
